name: Total No. of Cases with no movement
query:
select
l.workflow_state,
count(case when DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30 then 1 end) as "No movement Since 30 Days",
count(case when DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15 then 1 end) as "No movement Since 15 Days",
count(case when DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7 then 1 end) as "No movement Since 7 Days"

from `tabLead` l
group by l.workflow_state
report_name: Total No. of Cases with no movement
